response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $15,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I propose to sell it to you for $12,000. This price reflects a significant value proposition while ensuring we can maintain a fair profit margin. I believe this offer strikes a balance between affordability and the true worth of the product. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
